summary: io_uring/rw: defer fsnotify calls to task context
details:
io_uring/rw: defer fsnotify calls to task context

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 2a853c206e553dd9c0a55c22858fd6a446d93e15, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit f63cf5192fe3418ad5ae1a4412eba5694b145f79. For more details please see the references link.
